entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Cambridge Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:06 a.m. MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -14.5Â°C

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times early this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023
